title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Enterprise Patterns', which statement about localization & i18n is most accurate?
choices: Localization & i18n always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Localization & i18n is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Localization & i18n is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Localization & i18n only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Localization & i18n is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
